tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was having wisdom tooth pain a lot, doctor said it was infected, then he suggested for wisdom tooth extraction, the Wisdom tooth extraction process went very well without pain-                     No  infection and No pain after extraction.They have great experience in it. I really recommend Doctor Vikram Shetty and Dr.Reema Shetty and  clinical team. Dr.Rajanikanth did my Wisdom tooth Extraction Very well. For Wisdom tooth Extraction I recommend the Smile and ShineDentalClinic Jeevan Bimanagar.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Great expertise. The doctor took time to explain the problem and the treatment in detail. He also recommended me toothpastes which I should use as per my oral health. I had a very good experience overall and I'm very happy with my treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Had a good experience with Dr. Shetty. Hardly any wait time, doctor gave a well rounded assessment and advice. The procedure was managed very well. Doctor stayed connected even after the procedure was completed for couple of days to check on recovery.

Dr Vikram and Dr Reema are very friendly this helps me explain my problem 100%. 
I had wisdom tooth removal procedure successfully by them and got the best care before and after procedure. I really appreciate about their patient’s care. 

Thanks you.

Dr Vikram and Dr Reema were very friendly to approach, they clearly the explained the issue (tooth decay) and then suggested and performed tooth filling instead of root canal as there was no pain even though the decay was close to the nerves. Happy with the procedure outcome. Dr. Reema even followed up over call/Sms to check if I doing well post the procedure. Thanks Dr Vikram and Dr Reema.

Dr. Vikram provides the highest standard in dental care and treatment. I've seen multiple dentists in Bangalore including the bigger companies, nobody gets any close to Dr Vikram's level of detail and care.The clinic is well equipped and Doc is kind, compassionate and a perfectionist when it comes to dental treatments.

I went to him for tooth cavity problem.
The doctor's got a lot of patience. He was answering all my questions with all the details. I got my tooth filling by him. He did it with utmost dedication and care. The clinic has got all the advanced equipment with a professional doctor to handle.
reply_text: Thanks for your valuable feed back. It is very Encouraging. We continue to provide Quality Dental Care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: You feel very confident and warm in his presence and can hardly find a person with such a degree of calmness , patience and perseverence and a open mind . One gets to know so many medical terms and insights in addition to getting the treatment . You come out happy and fullfilled at the end of it and with lot to learn from his ibteraction . what else one needs if the above experience meets you when you went there with a problem .God bless him and yes thank you
reply_text: Thanks so much for your valuable feed back and kind words... Happy to note your Appreciation... We provide Quality Dental Care with a high degree of Professionalism... Thank You....

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I would certainly recommend the doctor since he has the expertise and experience to treat for any dental procedures. I had consulted him for wisdom tooth extraction and was vert satisfied with the procedure as well as his follow up aftrr the treatment as well
reply_text: Thanks maam for your valuable feed back.   We will continue to provide Quality Dental treatment with the best care possible.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My consultation is with Dr. Rima Shetty. The wait time is really less and the doctor is really informative during the general checkup.  She has explained and addressed all the concerns.  Doctor is really friendly and I recommend her without a doubt.
